Room1.Name: Outskirts
Room1.Description: The outer parts of the enemies facility, you are surrounded by wild vegetation.

Room2.Name: Yard
Room2.Description: You can see the main entrance just a few steps farther. Enemies forces have been deployed all around the building and' The Bird's ' body still lays there...

Room3.Name: Main Hall
Room3.Description: There is a wide area in front of your eyes, dozens of columns scattered in the room. There is a security station with a prominent control table in one of the corners

Room4.Name: Lab
Room4.Description: There are unusual machines and manufacturing chains all across the room. It seems like there is no current process going on.

Room5.Name: Warehouse
Room5.Description: You can see two different areas, the first sets up the unloading zone for the incoming lorries, and the second is some kind of shelves storing different goods.

Room6.Name: Vault
Room6.Description: You find nothing but quietness and some kind of broken dispenser machine right in the middle of the room.

Exit0.Name: Secondary road
Exit0.Description: A secondary road going towards the enemy territory.

Exit1.Name: Main Door
Exit1.Description: Main entrance to the enemy facility.

Exit2.Name: Yard's staircase
Exit2.Description: Staircase leading to the parking which ends in front of the facility's warehouse backdoor.

Exit3.Name: Secondary road
Exit3.Description: A secondary road going towards the enemy territory.

Exit5.Name: Security Door
Exit5.Description: A robust door, made of steel and covered by numerous security mechanisms.

Item2.Name: Super Last Oportunity
Item2.Description: Resurrects de player automatically and restores his full HP

Item5.Name: Machine gun chest
Item5.Description: Chest with a machine gun within

Item8.Name: Autorization
Item8.Description: Allows the entrance to the Vault

Character3.Name: The Grandmama
Character3.Description: Spy inserted within the enemy organization
